Text:
Look for examples in this repo:
https://github.com/TelegramBots/Telegram.Bot.Examples

You can look this in official API:
https://core.telegram.org/bots/api

This should be in official library book:
https://telegrambots.github.io/book/

First you should read about bots:
https://core.telegram.org/bots

Check out this huge webhook guide: 
https://core.telegram.org/bots/webhooks

"like, subscribe, put a bell on it:"
https://github.com/TgBotFramework
If you need a Telegram Client API library in .NET, check out this group: (links in the pinned message): https://t.me/WTelegramClient

(.Net 6.0, C#10 and vs2022 or Rider2021.3 required)
Just download, put your token and launch. In console you'll see all data that telegram sends you. https://github.com/TgBotFramework/TgBotFramework.Examples/tree/master/TelegramApiDebug
